object_description: a blue rectangular foam eraser with the brand name DAHLE on it

milestones.label: approach
milestones.description: Hand begins moving towards the blue eraser.

milestones.label: contact
milestones.description: The fingers make first contact with the sides of the eraser.

milestones.label: grasp
milestones.description: The hand has a firm grip on the eraser, preparing to move it.

milestones.label: start_slide
milestones.description: The hand begins sliding the eraser across the gray surface.

milestones.label: stop_slide
milestones.description: The eraser reaches its new position and movement stops.

milestones.label: release
milestones.description: The fingers let go of the eraser.

milestones.label: retreat
milestones.description: The hand moves away from the object and out of the frame.

success_criteria.name: is_contacted
success_criteria.description: Hand makes contact with the object

success_criteria.name: reached_target
success_criteria.description: The object has been moved to a new location

metrics.name: slide_distance
metrics.description: Total distance the object was moved

metrics.name: movement_smoothness
metrics.description: Measure of how steady the slide was
